name: The N featurebuild
description:
A frequently updated version of the N. But these Versions will unlikely contain bugs and are the last versions before the monthly build.

This is a development Version! Download the stable and tested Version here!

BETA

Please report us every bug you find! (Here)

Join us on Discord and decide how the story continues!

You can also help us translating the game in other languages. If you want to, contact us on Discord

[ENG]

The N is a point and click game based on our nEngine.

It offers:

  • Beautiful Graphics drawn by us
  • Funny dialogues
  • Some nice details
  • And much more

[DE]

The N ist ein point and click Spiel, dass auf unserer nEngine basiert.

Es bietet:

  • Schöne, selbst gezeichnete Grafiken
  • Witzige Dialoge
  • Ein paar nette Details
  • und vieles mehr
